ygData.subject: RE: intro
ygData.msgSnippet: I purchased the ones for lvl 20 in Felwithe and am greatly anticipating my ability to scribe them. ... From: Vincent Archer [mailto:Vincent.Archer@hsc.fr]
ygData.messageBody:
I purchased the ones for lvl 20 in Felwithe and am greatly anticipating
my ability to scribe them.


-----Original Message-----
From: Vincent Archer [mailto:Vincent.Archer@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:52 AM
To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] intro


From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

According to McCartney, Michael R:
> Anyone know if you can buy the level 20 portal spells? Or if they
*must* be researched?

If I remember right, they are in one vendor in Felwithe. That vendor
sells
only gate, portals and evacuates spells, but all the "basic" ones.
(i.e. those to portals in activity)

Neriak has them from what I heard, and Erudin's Library is a reference
location too.

Portals, Gates and Evacuates may exist to buried portal locations (such
as the south ro locations and so on), but those must be researched.
--
